name: Where's My Mommy?
description: Poopy was living happily with his mother in a dark and moist place that was their home. Then, one night, a violent and unexpected earthquake ejected Poopy's mother from their nest, leaving the little child alone and terrified. And so, Poopy began a dangerous journey to save his mother's life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or latest Processor: intel i3 32bits Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game 'Where is my mommy' is full of creative ♥♥♥♥. You switch between diarrhea and some kind of constipation to follow your 'flushing' mom. While doing this u can be faster (diarrhea) or smash items like drug bags or old forgotten condoms. I really like it and I'd say its worth the money.
Hahaha very fun! ... And hard! : S  : D
this game is a hoot i love the comical of the game has with the little poop and all the osbitcals love it
